overview: After being a long coma, special agent Michael Harpt(Tristan DeAngelis) is expected to take down a new drug distributor(Erik Wilk) on the rise. But while on this mission, all goes south as the agents realize there’s a rat among them. This sequel to the second film, years in the making, stars Tristan DeAngelis, Aiden Sweeny, Matt Sansone, Ecin Copes, and more. The action, thriller written and directed by Tristan DeAngelis will have audiences shocked and excited by Tristan’s seventh film.
title: Beast Mode 3
